channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A stock market melt-up may be the biggest risk facing investors, says this strategist
item.description: Ed Yardeni of Yardeni Research says the stock market could be facing a “speculative bubble,” given recent fresh highs.

item.title: ‘Finance makes me break out in hives’: I inherited $240K from my parents. Do I pay off my $258K mortgage and give up my job?
item.description: “I inherited $240K. Do I pay off my $258K mortgage and downsize my house and job?”

item.title: The stock market is hitting records — three reasons why top Morgan Stanley strategist sees more room to run
item.description: Equities may have already started to price in more Fed interest rate cuts

item.title: This is the former Soviet weapons base that Ivanka Trump and Jared Kushner want to turn into a luxury resort
item.description: The couple plan to transform one of the last undeveloped islands in the Mediterranean into a must-visit destination for the wealthy and privileged.

item.title: Former Baltimore Ravens kicker Justin Tucker lists Maryland home for $3.2 million

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
